truth: -  "Plants use chlorophyll to absorb sunlight in the process of photosynthesis."
fiction: -  "Plants use chocolate to absorb sunlight in the process of photosynthesis."

truth: -  "Angiosperms are a group of plants that produce flowers and have seeds enclosed within a carpel."
fiction: -  "Angiosperms are a group of plants that produce fireworks and have seeds enclosed within a candy wrapper."

truth: -  "Xylem is a type of tissue in vascular plants that transports water and dissolved nutrients upward from the root."
fiction: -  "Xylem is a type of tissue in vascular plants that transports soda and dissolved candy upward from the root."

truth: -  "Ferns reproduce via spores and have neither seeds nor flowers."
fiction: -  "Ferns reproduce via sparks and have neither seeds nor flowers, but rather tiny light bulbs."

truth: -  "The process of transpiration in plants involves the movement of water from the roots to the leaves, where it evaporates into the atmosphere."
fiction: -  "The process of transpiration in plants involves the movement of milk from the roots to the leaves, where it turns into cheese."

truth: -  "Stomata are tiny openings on the surface of leaves that allow for gas exchange."
fiction: -  "Stomata are tiny openings on the surface of leaves that allow for the exchange of secret messages."

truth: -  "Cacti are adapted to survive in arid environments by storing water in their thick, fleshy stems."
fiction: -  "Cacti are adapted to survive in arid environments by storing soda in their thick, fleshy stems."

truth: -  "Deciduous trees lose their leaves in the fall to conserve water during the winter."
fiction: -  "Deciduous trees lose their leaves in the fall to conserve their collection of autumn leaf paintings."

truth: -  "The Venus flytrap is a type of carnivorous plant that captures and digests insects."
fiction: -  "The Venus flytrap is a type of carnivorous plant that captures and digests lost socks."

truth: -  "Algae are a diverse group of aquatic organisms that have the ability to conduct photosynthesis."
fiction: -  "Algae are a diverse group of aquatic organisms that have the ability to conduct orchestras."

truth: -  "Mosses are non-vascular plants that absorb water and nutrients mainly through their leaves."
fiction: -  "Mosses are non-vascular plants that absorb water and nutrients mainly through their dreams."

truth: -  "The process of pollination involves the transfer of pollen from the male parts of a flower to the female parts of the same or a different flower."
fiction: -  "The process of pollination involves the transfer of pollen from the male parts of a flower to the female parts of the same or a different pizza."

truth: -  "Seeds are the mature fertilized ovule of angiosperms and gymnosperms and contain an embryo."
fiction: -  "Seeds are the mature fertilized ovule of angiosperms and gymnosperms and contain a tiny elephant."

truth: -  "The process of germination occurs when a seed absorbs water, swells, and bursts the seed coat, leading to the growth of the embryo into a seedling."
fiction: -  "The process of germination occurs when a seed absorbs water, swells, and bursts into song, leading to the growth of the embryo into a Broadway star."

truth: -  "Lichens are symbiotic associations between a fungus and an alga or cyanobacterium."
fiction: -  "Lichens are symbiotic associations between a fungus and a unicorn or a dragon."

truth: -  "The process of nastic movements in plants involves responses to environmental stimuli that are independent of the direction of the stimuli."
fiction: -  "The process of nastic movements in plants involves responses to environmental stimuli that are independent of the direction of the latest fashion trends."

truth: -  "The process of phototropism involves the growth of a plant in response to light direction."
fiction: -  "The process of phototropism involves the growth of a plant in response to the direction of a GPS."

truth: -  "The bark of a tree serves as a protective layer against environmental threats."
fiction: -  "The bark of a tree serves as a protective layer against alien invasions."

truth: -  "Roots provide support for the plant, absorb water and nutrients from the soil, and store food."
fiction: -  "Roots provide support for the plant, absorb Wi-Fi signals from the soil, and store digital data."
